title: Riot removed the ability to see total BE count?
body:
A while back I made a post about how I had over 6 digits of BE but couldn't see the specific number.  Riot implemented a (I'm guessing temporary) fix which was a question mark button beside the BE opening a popup with your Total BE count.  

I currently have 101K BE but have no way to view the specific number anymore.  Did Riot remove this? Why?
